Pre-Game Insights: Captain Jos Buttler led his team to glory at the first time of asking in the T20 World Cup 2022 with a confident victory over this series's visitors.
Others: The England v Pakistan 1st T20 match takes place at 6:30pm on Wednesday 22nd May 2024.
You can watch the series live on Sky Sports Cricket and Main Event.
The England v Pakistan schedule is as follows:
1st T20 at Headingley, Leeds: 6:30pm, Wednesday 22nd May
2nd T20 at Edgbaston, Birmingham: 2:30pm, Saturday 25th May
3rd T20 at Sophia Gardens, Cardiff: 6:30pm, Tuesday 28th May
4th T20 at The Oval, London: 6:30pm, Thursday 30th May
